name: Cold Summer - Royal Blue Logo Pocket Tee + ST Album
description:
T-shirt is a fruit of the loom pocket tee, in Royal Blue currenty available in Mens, Small, Medium & Large (see size availability in the drop down boxes below)


includes our self titled album on vinyl style cd in a jewel case with artwork 

Tracklisting

1. The Fallen 
2. Waiting 
3. Ships 
4. Processed Lives 
5. Car Crash (In Progress) 
6. Waiting (Alternative Version) 
7. Wake 
8. A Is For Arson

and the bundle also includes a limited metallic copy of our 'Wake' ep (which could only be previously purchased at our show with Lemuria) and also a badge & sticker pack!


check out

http://coldsummer.bandcamp.com for some free digital downloads
